sect1.title: GUI
sect1.para: The shows a screen shot of the PBS plug-in GUI page for pod-console.

Using the plug-ins GUI (see. ) users are able to specify a number of workers and an PBS queue. PoD provides a default PBS job script. Advanced users a free to change it in order to tune PoD for a specific environment or tasks.

sect1.title: CLI
sect1.para: For users convenience PoD provides a command line interface. One can also use PoD CLI to submit PoD jobs, instead of using GUI. Meet the CLI documentation and check out the reference for further information.

sect1.title: Configuration
sect1.para: There are PBS plug-in options in the PoD user defaults (see ), which you can use to tune the plug-in.
